newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: ALLWEAR , HICOR TALKS CONTINUE.
newsitem.headline: ALLWEAR , HICOR TALKS CONTINUE.

text.p: Hicor Ltd and Allwear Ltd said on Tuesday they were still considering proposals, which if successfully concluded, could result in Allwear being delisted from the Johannesburg Stock Exchange.
Shareholders were advised to be cautious in their share dealings. The two companies first announced they were in discussions on December 13.
